This is kind of like, I don't want to call it a fail safe. It's like a default response in different situations. So if the typical behavior of the default company is that if you don't know where someone works, or maybe you don't particularly care where they work, the default company is a catch all for candidates. The way it interacts with the job board is web candidates that apply typically go into the default company. So if the default company is not there when web candidates try to apply, there's nowhere for them to go. So that's why that error is being thrown. There's nowhere for PCR to help them.
